of Phang Nga Province. It is the administrative headquarters of the province's Takua Pa District.
Regular buses from the provincial capital, Phang Nga, throughout the day. ~1 hour, 70 baht. Also, buses en route Bangkok-Phuket pass through Takua Pa hourly during the day.
